title: Biometrics Centres for Hong Kong International Students

replies.msg:
求簽名

https://www.change.org/p/australian-immigration-open-biometrics-centres-for-hong-kong-international-students

Too many Hong Kong international students are stuck at their Student Visa (Subclass 500) Application whilst await for the opening of Biometrics centre in Hong Kong.

We seek everyone's involvement to petition this towards the Immigration and Government of Australia in opening the Biometrics centre, so Hong Kong International Students can be treated fairly, with at least a grant of visa, allowing them to meet "Australian Study Requirement" even if the study is required to be ONLINE.

Hong Kongers have been long suffered from the unfair treatments in the past years between 2019 and 2020, should the Government of Australia really seek in assist of the passion of Hong Kong International Students, we request an URGENT HELP on the matter!

簽咗
不過有用咩

澳洲早排比香港個Pr pathway都比本地人屌到爆
連配偶證都未有得攪就攪你香港人先
